Uses of Interface
org.opensaml.xml.security.SecurityConfiguration

  • Packages that use SecurityConfiguration 
    Package Description
    org.opensaml.xml
    Base classes for working with XML as Java objects and configuring the library.
    org.opensaml.xml.security
    Interfaces and classes used in representing cryptographic credentials, evaluating the trustworthiness of security of tokens, etc.

    • Uses of SecurityConfiguration in org.opensaml.xml
